# MLDataValue.string(_:)

**Case**

A string value.

## Declaration

```swift
case string(String)
```

## Creating a data value

- **MLDataValue.int(_:)**: An integer value.
- **MLDataValue.double(_:)**: A double value.
- **MLDataValue.dictionary(_:)**: A dictionary of named data values.
- **MLDataValue.sequence(_:)**: A sequence of data values.
- **MLDataValue.multiArray(_:)**: A multidimensional array of data values.

items.description: A dictionary of named data values.
items.name: MLDataValue.dictionary(_:)

items.description: A multidimensional array of data values.
items.name: MLDataValue.multiArray(_:)
